verses.verse: Dare <S%G5111><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of you, <S%G5216><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a matter <S%G4229><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> another, <S%G2087><s%> go to law <S%G2919><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> unjust, <S%G94><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> saints? <S%G40><s%>

Do ye not <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> saints <S%G40><s%> shall judge <S%G2919><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world? <S%G2889><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> shall be judged <S%G2919><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> ye unworthy <S%G370><s%> to judge the smallest matters? <S%G2922><s%> <S%G1646><s%>
Know <S%G1492><s%> ye not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we shall judge <S%G2919><s%> angels? <S%G32><s%> how much more <S%G3386><s%> things that pertain to this life? <S%G982><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> ye <S%G3303><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> judgments <S%G2922><s%> of things pertaining to this life, <S%G982><s%> set <S%G2523><s%> them <S%G5128><s%> to judge who are least esteemed <S%G1848><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> church. <S%G1577><s%>

I speak <S%G3004><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> your <S%G5213><s%> shame. <S%G1791><s%> Is it so, <S%G3779><s%> that there is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a wise man <S%G4680><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you? <S%G5213><s%> no, not <S%G3761><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> shall be able <S%G1410><s%> to judge <S%G1252><s%> between <S%G303><s%> <S%G3319><s%> his <S%G848><s%> brethren? <S%G80><s%>
But <S%G235><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> goeth to law <S%G2919><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> the unbelievers. <S%G571><s%>

Now <S%G2235><s%> therefore there <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3303><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> utterly <S%G3654><s%> a fault <S%G2275><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> ye go to law <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2917><s%> one with another. <S%G3326><s%> <S%G1438><s%> Why <S%G1302><s%> do ye not <S%G3780><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> take wrong? <S%G91><s%> why <S%G1302><s%> do ye not <S%G3780><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> suffer yourselves to be defrauded? <S%G650><s%>
Nay, <S%G235><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> do wrong, <S%G91><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> defraud, <S%G650><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G5023><s%> your brethren. <S%G80><s%>

<S%G2228><s%> Know <S%G1492><s%> ye not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the unrighteous <S%G94><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> inherit <S%G2816><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%> Be not <S%G3361><s%> deceived: <S%G4105><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> fornicators, <S%G4205><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> idolaters, <S%G1496><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> adulterers, <S%G3432><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> effeminate, <S%G3120><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> abusers of themselves with mankind, <S%G733><s%>

Nor <S%G3777><s%> thieves, <S%G2812><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> covetous, <S%G4123><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> drunkards, <S%G3183><s%> nor <S%G3756><s%> revilers, <S%G3060><s%> nor <S%G3756><s%> extortioners, <S%G727><s%> shall <S%G3756><s%> inherit <S%G2816><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> such <S%G5023><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of you: but <S%G235><s%> ye are washed, <S%G628><s%> but <S%G235><s%> ye are sanctified, <S%G37><s%> but <S%G235><s%> ye are justified <S%G1344><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

All things <S%G3956><s%> are lawful <S%G1832><s%> unto me, <S%G3427><s%> but <S%G235><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are not expedient: <S%G4851><s%> <S%G3756><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are lawful <S%G1832><s%> for me, <S%G3427><s%> but <S%G235><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will not <S%G3756><s%> be brought under the power <S%G1850><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> any. <S%G5100><s%>

Meats <S%G1033><s%> for the <S%G3588><s%> belly, <S%G2836><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> belly <S%G2836><s%> for meats: <S%G1033><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> shall destroy <S%G2673><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> it <S%G5026><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> them. <S%G5023><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> for fornication, <S%G4202><s%> but <S%G235><s%> for the <S%G3588><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> for the <S%G3588><s%> body. <S%G4983><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath both <S%G2532><s%> raised up <S%G1453><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will also raise up <S%G1825><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> his own <S%G848><s%> power. <S%G1411><s%>

What? <S%G2228><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> ye not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he which is joined <S%G2853><s%> to a harlot <S%G4204><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> body? <S%G4983><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> two, <S%G1417><s%> saith <S%G5346><s%> he, shall be <S%G2071><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> flesh. <S%G4561><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> he that is joined <S%G2853><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

Flee <S%G5343><s%> fornication. <S%G4202><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> sin <S%G265><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> doeth <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1437><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> without <S%G1622><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> body; <S%G4983><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he that committeth fornication <S%G4203><s%> sinneth <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> body. <S%G4983><s%>
